text: allahana margadalli valase hodatanu bhumiyalli dharala asrayagalannu hagu sakastu vaisalyavannu kanuvanu. Tanna maneyinda, allah mattavana dutaredege valasiganagi horatavanu (dariyalli) mrtanadare, khanditavagiyu avana pratiphalada hone allahana melide. Allahanantu ksamasilanu karunamayiyu agiddane
